overview: Mrs. Anita Worden is an experienced and successful business leader with a proven track record of creating solid management teams and financial backing. From 1989-2005, as the Co-Founder, President, and Board Member of Solectria Corporation, an internationally recognized leader in the electric and hybrid vehicle industry, she skillfully lead all aspects of operations and financing, resulting in the Company’s tremendous growth and its successful sale in 2005. Mrs. Worden is a Co-founder and Chairwoman of Solectria Renewables and continues to bring exceptional leadership, team building and financial relationships to the Company. Since 2005, she has lead the organization and increased the Company’s financial strength resulting in zero debt. Under Mrs. Worden’s leadership, Solectria Renewables’ revenues have grown multi-fold and it has become a leader in the Photovoltaic Inverter industry. Mrs. Worden is an active member of: Solar Energy Business Association of New England (SEBANE), CT Solar Energy Association, American Solar Energy Society (ASES), SEIA, Northeast Sustainable Energy Association (NESEA), SEPA and the Merrimack Valley Chamber of Commerce. Mrs. Worden is a graduate of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
